comment: Minimal use of textbook. Homework counted for 60% of grade, but he drops the lowest assignment. They are not hard as long as you follow the directions, exactly. However the class revolves around a group design project, especially during the later stage of the class. Brings up tangentially related work experience a bit too often though.
This guy is the worst. There is not enough room in the class for his ego. Questions unclear. Does not use book. By far, one of the worst professors at SPSU. AVOID
